GET_ALL_WORDS: select * from words w where w.isDisabled=0
GET_WORD: select * from words w where id=? and w.isDisabled=0
GET_WORD_BY_VIDEO_URL: select * from words w where video_url_english=:videourl OR video_url_hindi=:videourl and w.isDisabled=0
GET_ALL_ENGLISH_CATEGORIES: select distinct category_english as title from words w where w.isDisabled=0
GET_ALL_HINDI_CATEGORIES: select distinct category_hindi as title from words w where w.isDisabled=0
GET_ENGLISH_CATEGORY_WORDS: select * from words w where w.category_english=? and w.isDisabled=0
GET_HINDI_CATEGORY_WORDS: select * from words w where w.category_hindi=? and w.isDisabled=0
ADD_WORD: INSERT INTO words (category_english, category_hindi, word_english, word_hindi, video_url_english, video_url_hindi) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
EDIT_WORD: UPDATE words SET category_english=?, category_hindi=?, word_english=?, word_hindi=?, video_url_english=?, video_url_hindi=? where id=?
DELETE_WORD: UPDATE words SET isDisabled=1 where id=?
